abstract: Even Philadelphia public radio is chiming in with "Phillies Fever," Curtis Granderson makes two thrilling catches for the Yankees and the collision between the Rays' Sean Rodriguez and Rangers catcher Mike Napoli is worth a little analysis.
snippet: Even Philadelphia public radio is chiming in with "Phillies Fever," Curtis Granderson makes two thrilling catches for the Yankees and the collision between the Rays' Sean Rodriguez and Rangers catcher Mike Napoli is worth a little analysis.

headline.main: Going Retro to Catch Phillies Fever; Granderson's Catches Worth a Replay
